long_description: The men's Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes feature an easy slip-on design and casual style so you can spend the summer days in comfort. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid from the Sanuk Sidewalk Surfer line, Vagabond slip-ons are shoe uppers on sandal bottoms. Uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them a well-worn look. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. Footbeds feature AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to deter odor development. EVA midsoles and outsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soles are rubberized EVA for durability. Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes are vegan-friendly.
short_description: The men's Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes feature an easy slip-on design and casual style so you can spend the summer days in comfort.
